articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets fall as Israel-Iran tensions spike; spotlight on oil, gold and bitcoin - CNBC
articles.description: Asian investors are keeping a close watch on how markets, especially oil and gold traders, will react to Iran's massive drone strikes on Israel over the weekend.
articles.content:
Employees work in the trading room inside the Mitsubishi UFJ Trust and Banking head office in Tokyo, Japan, on Tuesday, March 19, 2024.
Asia-Pacific markets fell Monday as traders weighed the impact… [+1514 chars]
